items.sentence: I can\'t tell you how many times that has happened to me.
All the songs we\'re singing tonight were written by Tom.
The two of them have been in Boston for over three years.
I wish that there were a French translation of this book.
Tom has come all the way from Boston to be with us today.
It won\'t be as difficult as you think it\'s going to be.
When was the last time you and Tom played chess together?
I\'m pretty sure that Tom gets paid a lot more than I do.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom would tell us if we were wrong.
I\'m pretty sure that it was Tom that I saw kissing Mary.
